member.name: T:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1
member.summary: Test fixture that tests a single endpoint, given a transport factory. The transport factory needs to have a default public c'tor. The endpoint is one-to-one with the bus in this test fixture.
member.typeparam: Type of transport factory to create the endpoint with

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.Setup
member.summary: Sets up the endpoint factory by calling the configurator (see ) and sets a few defaults on the service bus factory.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.FixtureTeardown
member.summary: Tears down the buses, tears down the endpoint caches.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.#ctor
member.summary: c'tor that sets up the endpoint configurator, its default settings, and uses the class type parameter as the transport for that endpoint.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.AddTransport``1
member.summary: Add further transport factories to the endpoint configured as a result of this test fixture set up logic.
member.typeparam: type of transport factory to add.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.ConfigureEndpointFactory(System.Action{MassTransit.EndpointConfigurators.EndpointFactoryConfigurator})
member.summary: Call this method from anytime before the test fixture set up starts running (i.e. in the c'tor) to configure the endpoint factory.
member.param: The action that configures the endpoint factory configurator.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.SetupSagaRepository``1
member.summary: Sets up a new in memory saga repository for the passed type of saga.
member.returns: An instance of the saga repository.

member.name: F:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.EndpointFactoryConfigurator
member.summary: Set this property to have custom [] logic.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.SetupServiceBus(System.Uri,System.Action{MassTransit.BusConfigurators.ServiceBusConfigurator})
member.summary: Call this method to set up a new service bus and add it to the list.
member.param: The bus endpoint uri (its consumption point)
The configuration action, that allows you to configure the new bus as you please.
member.returns: The new service bus that was configured.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.SetupServiceBus(System.Uri)
member.summary: See .
member.param: The uri to set the service bus up at.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.ConfigureServiceBus(System.Uri,MassTransit.BusConfigurators.ServiceBusConfigurator)
member.summary: This method does nothing at all. Override (you don't need to call into the base) to provide the default action to configure the buses newly created, with.
member.param: The uri that is passed from the configuration lambda of the bus.

member.name: P:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.Buses
member.summary:
Gets the list of buses that are created in this test fixture. Call
to create more of them

member.name: P:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.EndpointTestFixture`1.EndpointCache
member.summary: Gets the endpoint cache implementation used in this test. Is set up during the [TestFixtureSetUp] phase aka. [Given] phase.

summary.para: WARN: this bus test fixture DOES NOT call

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.TwoBusTestFixture`1.TwoBusTestFixtureSetup
member.summary: Sets up the remote and local bus and their target coordinators/subscription routers.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.TwoBusTestFixture`1.TwoBusTestFixtureTeardown
member.summary: Makes remote and local bus = null.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.TwoBusTestFixture`1.ConfigureLocalBus(MassTransit.BusConfigurators.ServiceBusConfigurator)
member.summary: You can override to configure the local bus; but if you don't call base method, you will not get the subscription loopback router.

member.name: M:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.TwoBusTestFixture`1.ConfigureRemoteBus(MassTransit.BusConfigurators.ServiceBusConfigurator)
member.summary: You can override to configure the remote bus; but if you don't call base method, you will not get the subscription loopback router.

member.name: P:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.TwoBusTestFixture`1.LocalUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the local uri, i.e. the bus endpoint for the local bus. Set this property in the c'tor of your subclassing test fixture.

member.name: P:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.TwoBusTestFixture`1.RemoteUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the remote uri, i.e. the bus endpoint for the remote bus. Set this property in the c'tor of your subclassing test fixture.

member.name: P:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.TwoBusTestFixture`1.LocalBus
member.summary: Gets the local bus. Is null when c'tor runs.

member.name: P:MassTransit.TestFramework.Fixtures.TwoBusTestFixture`1.RemoteBus
member.summary: Gets the remote bus. Is null when c'tor runs.

member.name: T:MassTransit.TestFramework.Future`1
member.summary: A future object that supports both callbacks and asynchronous waits once a future value becomes available.
